title: Optimal Knowledge Transfer Strategy for International Joint Ventures

context.prior_knowledge: Inter-organizational collaboration experience, basic international business concepts, and ability to distinguish tacit/explicit knowledge
context.additional_context: VR-based international joint venture scenario implementation, simulating knowledge sharing across multinational teams

learning_goals: Learners can analyze explicit knowledge transfer mechanisms in international joint ventures using structural equation modeling.
Learners can explain the differential impact of psychic distance on tacit and explicit knowledge transfer.
Learners evaluate their ability to make strategic decisions to enhance knowledge diffusion capabilities in a virtual simulation environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
